Retro! y2k is upon us

Today, brimming with whimsy, I indulged in a creative sojourn and conjured a nostalgic 2000s-style website, complete with a charming little nook for books—simply because the muse beckoned. Should your heart yearn for a retro diversion, feel free to wander here.

And since one flight of fancy often begets another, I also fashioned a companion library in that same delightful style, waiting to be discovered here.
